text: He's Just Not That Into You is a 2009 American romantic comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Ken Kwapis and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. Actors include Ben Affleck, Sasha Alexander, Jennifer Aniston, Drew Barrymore, Jennifer Connelly, Kevin Connolly, Ginnifer Goodwin, Scarlett Johansson, Kris Kristofferson, and Justin Long. It was based on the 2004 book of the same name by Greg Behrendt and Liz Tuccillo. == Other websites == * * Category:2009 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Dutch romance movies Category:Dutch comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ken Kwapis
title: He's Just Not That Into You
